/usr/bin/c++   -O2 -g -DNDEBUG    CMakeFiles/chapter09.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter09.dir/scenefire.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter09.dir/sceneparticles.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter09.dir/sceneparticlesfeedback.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter09.dir/sceneparticlesinstanced.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter09.dir/scenesmoke.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter09.dir/scenewave.cpp.o  -o chapter09 -rdynamic ../ingredients/libingredients.a /usr/local/lib/libglfw3.a -lGL -lpthread -lXrandr -lXxf86vm -lXi -lrt
